 O.k. then. He traced that signal and found ice.
Mustex:I need to find Veratis. I have technology he can use if he'll 
do a favor for me.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@p...> wrote:
> OK, to clear a few things up, Lunarpine, Razor Claw, and Foxfingers 
are on
> Spain searching for clues to the dissapearance of Silver Scout
> 
> Ice is on Alliance island doing the same, nobody posted that the 
shields
> were up so her flight is legal.
> 
> Lady Hawk is being held inside Alliance base waiting to be released 
after
> creating two monsters for Zardus.
> 
> Veratis is in his base discussing things with Grizzltron in Norway.
> 
> and Megaton is somewhere in North America licking his wounds.
> 
> Veratis doesn't believe in destructive hand weapons but that 
doesn't mean
> that they're wimps or defenseless. find a sight with the mutants 
file cards
> and you'll see what I mean.
> ----- Original Message -----
> From: <dewboy30816@y...>
> To: <nbwrpg@y...>
> Sent: Friday, July 20, 2001 3:56 AM
> Subject: Re: Alliance
> 
> 
> > WELL HOW'D THE MUTANTS GET THERE IN THE FIRST PLACE! Shileds 
aren't
> > invincible you know. Remember when Black Aracnia helped Turantulas
> > steal a stasis pod.
> >
> > --- In nbwrpg@y..., Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> > > Feels good to finally have the time to make a nice long post :-)
> > >
> > > LegendaryNemasis, you might find Zardus's insight cheap in this
> > post and future ones. However, there was a faction a long time 
ago in
> > this RPG called the Energonians. They were energy beings much like
> > yours, just they used energon energy instead of chaotican, and 
Zardus
> > had a long rivalry with their leader (who happened to be one of 
the
> > bots that helped Zardus and Wolfgang make the Alliance), so he 
knows
> > how to handle energy beings.
> > >
> > > And the guy who controls Mustex: how'd Mustex get onto Alliance
> > Island? The shields were up.
> > >
> > > ::Zardus/FZ/DevilDuer/Mosquitor::
> > >
> > > Zardus frowns, thinking Frostbite's transmission over for a 
second
> > and then replying. "I would preffer meeting in neutral territory.
> > Would the peninsula near my base be convenient for you?"
> > >
> > > He closes that link, and recieves Orchestra's transmission. 
"This
> > is Zardus, Alliance commander. I'll lower the shields so that you 
can
> > get through. I'll be outside, we can meet there."
> > >
> > > He walks toward the exit, looking at his wrist comp and tapping 
a
> > few buttons, making a search for "Infecticons". The search yields 
no
> > matches. Zardus traces the Infecticon transmissions back to their
> > origin, then makes a search for any bots that the Iron Fist's
> > scanners detected traveling in that direction.
> > >
> > > "Interesting..." he says to himself, watching video footage of
> > Vampiza flying over Alliance Island, surrounded by Chaotican 
energy.
> > He zooms in, looking the bot over.
> > >
> > > Uncanny resembalance to Energonians, he thinks to himself,
> > activating his comm to Daemos: "Daemos, can you report to my 
position
> > as soon as possible? I need you to accompany me somewhere."
> > >
> > > Zardus ends that transmission as well, exiting the base and 
seeing
> > a bot firing. He frowns, tapping a few buttons to turn the 
autoguns
> > off, and begin lowering the shields.
> > >
> > > "You're either very brave or very stupid," he says, approaching 
the
> > shields on the other side of which was Chaostaur (whatever his 
name
> > is). "Attacking a military installation single-handedly is a very
> > suicidal task."
> > > ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> > > FZ nods, looking over the beasts once more.
> > >
> > > "Yes. I must admit I wasn't expecting you to accomplish this."
> > >
> > > He turns and walks toward the exit, the door opening. "Would you
> > like a shuttle to get back to wherever you are from, or would you
> > rather fly by yourself?"
> > > ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> > > DevilDuer waits for Coput to get into the pilot seat, so that 
they
> > can get going and he can get away from these weirdos. :-)
> > > ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> > > Mosquitor is hit by Hurricane's shots (post 38120. Sorry for 
taking
> > so long to reply), stumbling a bit.
> > >
> > > "Traitor! Hell Beast will have your head!" he yells and lunges 
at
> > Hurricane again, swinging a large insect leg at him.
> >
> >
